summary: Completed comprehensive testing of new work order postpone/partial close features and machine file attachments. All new features are working correctly with proper UI integration and backend API support.
passed_tests: Work order postpone functionality - dialog opens, form submission works, status changes to 'pospuesta'
Work order partial close functionality - dialog opens, form submission works, status changes to 'cerrada_parcial'
New order statuses display correctly in work order lists with proper badges
Postpone dialog shows date field and reason field with proper validation
Partial close dialog shows notes field with proper validation
Machine file attachments section visible in machine detail dialog
Machine file upload button present and accessible
All users (admin and technician) can access machine file functionality
Backend API endpoints for postpone and partial close working correctly
Backend API endpoints for machine attachments (upload, list, download, delete) working correctly
History tracking works for postpone and partial close actions
Status badges show correct colors and labels for new statuses
Work order detail page shows postpone and partial close information cards when applicable

success_percentage.backend: 100% - All new API endpoints working correctly
success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All new UI features working correctly
